name: Header components
description:
Develop an eye for good Ui & Ux by cloning Pinterest. In this short video we'll start making Figma components for each element in Pinterest's home page. We'll make a component for Pinterest's Home Button, the search bar component, Profile image component, a component for the dropdown button, and the create Pin component. The only component left in the homepage is the Pin component and we'll do it in the next video.


This is the second video in the "Clone Pinterest in Figma" playlist. "Clone Pinterest in Figma" is a playlist of short vids, each focused on taking one or two small steps towards copying Pinterest in Figma.


Watch a quick video tutorial
